resources.string: Because all bad people are pigs
press this button if you want to add exta information about the person
press this button to report the incident
press this button to expand the list
press this button to charaza this person
press this button to comment on this incident
press this button to post your comment
Press + to add anything else that you know about the person
No one has commented on this incident. Press the comment button to add a comment
press this button to add something else about the person
Charaza was designed and developed by Jason Rogena (jasonrogena@gmail.com)
This version is the first to be released to the public and is considered a pre-beta version. Your feedback will be highly appreciated. Please forgive the occasional bug
Charaza is a croudsourced community policing application whose aim is to whistleblow injustices committed on the Kenyan mwanainchi
This is probably your first time so please take some time to read through the instructions
In this page you can report on someone who has commited a crime
In this screen, you can view who has been charazwad the most
This page shows information about the person you have just selected
This page shows the crimes this person has committed. Press on any of the crimes to comment on that particular crime
Press the charaza button at the bottom of the screen to charaza the person
This screen contains a list of people who have most recently committed crimes
Click any of the names in the list to view the crimes the person has committed
The list in this screen shows the names and the number of times the people in the list have been charazwad. Click on any of the names in the list to view the crimes the person has committed
Press the pig in the top-left corner of the screen to navigate to other pages in the application
If you know something else about the person (apart from the name), press the + button
When you are done adding information about the crime, press the flashlight
Charaza is a Kenyan whistle-blowing application with a twist. With Charaza, you can either report on somebody\'s criminal activity or charaza the people who have already been reported on
